attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!â€¦ Start.

attributes.review: In December 2019 I made a life-changing decision to download this app. Needless to say I did not know this would change my life. Soon after downloading this app my spine started crackling at first to begin only in small sections but then it escalated where I was in critical condition many hours of the night. I had to call the ER and it turned out that 9D2 sections of my spine were dislocated and discombobulated all because of Trump. This app needs to be shut down immediately in order to save the countless lives you could suffer with the same conditions that I did. thank you â¤ï¸ğŸ˜.
attributes.title: This app broke my spine

attributes.review: This app is so awful. I never knew that my phone could lag like that. Not only was the app slow, it also messed with my whole phone. I think they have my phone bugged now. Because of the app, the government has access to my phone number, email, text messages, social media passwords, and my photos. I personally received a phone call from the president himself saying that I should spend less time taking selfies and more time exercising (who is he to judge!!) Anyways, I would not recommend this app and I would give it zero stars if I could.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review:
Martha was an average dog, 

She went (woof!) and (arf!) and (growwwlll) 

Then she ate some alphabet soup and what happened was BiZaRrE- 

On the way to Martha's stomach, the letters lost their way. 

They travelled to her brain 

And now she's got a lot to say!! 

How now, brown cow? 

Martha speaks 

Yeah, she speaks and speaks And speaks and speaks and speaks 

MARTHA: What's a caboose? When are we eating again? 

NARRATOR: Martha speaks 

MARTHA: Hey, Joe, what do you know? 

HELEN: My name's not Joe. 

NARRATOR: She's not always right But still that Martha speaks 

MARTHA: Hi there! 

NARRATOR: She's got a voice, she's ready to shout 

Martha will tell you what it's all about 

Sometimes wrong, but seldom in doubt 

Martha will tell you what it's all about 

That dog's unique 

MARTHA: Testing, one, two! 

NARRATOR: Hear her speak 

Martha speaks and speaks And speaks and speaks and... 

MARTHA: Communicates, enumerates 

Elucidates, exxagerates 

Indicates and explicates 

Bloviates and overstates and... 

Pant, pant, pant ...hyperventilates! 

NARRATOR: Martha to reiterate 

MARTHA AND NARRATOR: Martha speaks
